name: imim1
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2
body: |- wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(wi(w1, w2), wi(w0, w2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(wi(w1, w2), wi(w0, w2)))
-| wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(w0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(wi(w1, w2), wi(w0, w2)))
-| wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(w0, w1))
|- wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(wi(w1, w2), wi(w0, w2)))

comment: A closed form of syllogism (see ~ syl ). Theorem *2.06 of [WhiteheadRussell] p. 100. Its associated inference is ~ imim1i . (Contributed by NM, 29-Dec-1992.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 25-May-2013.)
